```{r}
load(file = "data/friendsmatrix.Rda")
load(file = "data/groups.Rda")
str(friends)
str(groups)
```

```{r}
n <- nrow(friends)

sources <- c()
targets <- c()

# Generate links
k <- 1
for (i in 1:n) {
  for (j in 1:n) {
    if (!is.na(friends[i,j])) {
      sources[k] <- i-1
      targets[k] <- j-1
      k <- k + 1
    }
  }
}

# Count number of friends for every subject in the network
sizes <- sapply(colnames(friends), function(s) return (exp(sum(targets + 1 == s))), USE.NAMES = FALSE)

# Create df for nodes (1 per subject)
friendNodes <- data.frame(subjectID = colnames(friends), size = sizes, group = groups)

# Create df for links
friendLinks <- data.frame(source = sources, target = targets, value = 1)

```

```{r}
forceNetwork(Links = friendLinks, Nodes = friendNodes, Source = "source", Target = "target", Value = "value", NodeID = "subjectID", Nodesize = "size", Group = "group", linkWidth = JS("function(d) { return Math.sqrt(d.value); }"), arrows = TRUE, legend = TRUE, zoom = T, opacity = 1, opacityNoHover = 1, width = 1000, height = 700, fontSize = 12)
```
